metadata.name: Adam Bomb Squad Tee (with LGT tag)

attributes.value: Adam Bomb Squad Tee (with LGT tag)

metadata.description: The exclusive ABS T Shirt is given to all holders of Adam Bomb Squad NFTs. As expected, shortly after release, they started appearing on secondary resell markets and websites. As such, we thought this would be the perfect product to drop as the first Physical NFT to be auctioned off via Drops.
